Action.author: lovesh
Action.body: The problem mentioned is resolved at https://github.com/evernym/plenum/blob/master/plenum/server/replica.py#L1502.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: I ran successfully with 2 second latency and 20% dropped packets. The nodes did not stay in sync all at the same time, but enough nodes were in sync to come to consensus and when the other nodes did catch up they took part in consensus.

Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: I inspected the code and recognize the fix for the mutating list. I alsoÂ believe Kelly's test result. Therefore I am accepting the fix.
